Interface PrimsMinimumSpanningTree.Adapter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Data reference
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DimensionSimilarityMatrix.PrimAdapter, PrimsMinimumSpanningTree.Array2DAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    PrimsMinimumSpanningTree

    public static interface PrimsMinimumSpanningTree.Adapter<T>
    Adapter interface to allow use with different data representations.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
